column1: * 1928 - Actor and narrator Bernard Cribbins is born.
* 1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien visits Allen and Unwin at Wikipedia:Museum Street in London.
* 1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Miss Perry.
* 1994 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue Tyalië Tyelelliéva 3 is published.
*This date marks the beginning of the six-day Yuletide festival in the Shire Calendar.
